title: When I Opened My Eyes I Was a Superstar - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Age Regression   Appearance Changes   Bullying   Celebrities   Handsome Male Lead   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Showbiz   Singers   Transmigration
author: Chun Tae Guh   천태거
description:
Kim Bo Myung, after graduating from high school years ago was living a below average life as an employee of an entertainment agencies PR department. 

After getting run over he opened his eyes to see that he was back in the past in the body of a member of an idol group?!

He gets a chance to regain his lost dreams and write a new legend in the entertainment world and take revenge……!>
